entry.meaning: a belief or opinion, often held by many people and based on how things seem:
a belief or opinion, often held by many people and based on how things seem:
to exchange one thing for another thing, especially of a similar type
said to thank someone for helping you and as a way of saying that you will do something for them in the future:
used to describe people or animals that are easy to love because they are so attractive and often small:
to judge or calculate the quality, importance, amount, or value of something:
the way of life, especially the general customs and beliefs, of a particular group of people at a particular time:
an advantage that only one person or group of people has, usually because of their position or because they are rich
the belief in freedom and equality between people, or a system of government based on this belief, in which power is either held by elected representatives or directly by the people themselves
